lines: ﻿After walking many miles Mango reached a small hut in which a light flickered. Two boys were whining, "Yesterday you promised to give us mangoes. Where are our mangoes?" Their father replied angrily, "Stop pestering me! Go outside, and you can have a whole tree!"

As soon as the boys went outside their father slammed the door. "Eat to your heart's content," he shouted from inside. It was pitch dark. The boys were frightened and kept close to the hut. Mango felt sorry for them and wanted to make them happy. He let four mangoes fall down, one after another.
